attributes.action: Give a Knighthood to Cpt Tom Moore for raising over £3m for the NHS.
attributes.additional_details:
Captain Tom Moore, on the eve of his 100th birthday, having already served his country over 70 years ago, is once again rising to the challenge facing our country.

He deserves this reward from the country and the people he has served.
attributes.background: Please use whatever influence can HMG to bring to bear, to persuade HM Queen Elizabeth II to award to Captain Tom Moore a Knighthood in recognition of his service to the people of the UK, ideally on his 100th birthday.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
